snippet: Reacting to an outcry, the newly appointed Sunderland manager, Paolo Di Canio, renounced his links to fascism.
abstract: Sunderland manager Paolo Di Canio retracts his links to fascism following public outcry over Nazi-style salutes he once performed to fans of his former soccer club Lazio.
lead_paragraph: Reacting to an outcry, the newly appointed Sunderland manager, Paolo Di Canio, renounced his links to fascism.

headline.seo: Sunderland’s Paolo Di Canio Responds to Criticism
headline.main: Sunderland’s Di Canio Responds to Criticism
